RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.label: Cheat quirks
RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.description: These quirks severely disrupt game balance and are disabled by default, but they're presented here in case you want to play with them. If you only want to enable them for specific pawns and do not want them spawning naturally, you do not need to enable them here; just enable dev mode and enter the quirks menu(s) of the desired pawn(s).

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Hammerspace
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label]’s body compresses [PAWN_possessive] prey down to an incredible degree. You can’t quite tell how many prey [PAWN_pronoun] has inside [PAWN_objective] at any given time, though you can guess if you know [PAWN_possessive] limit.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Hyper-efficient
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] is about ten times as efficient as any other predator when it comes to extracting nutrition and producing materials from prey. It's like dropping a rough mint candy into soda.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Inedible
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] cannot be eaten. It just physically cannot happen. How? Don't ask questions; this is a cheat quirk.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Never Predator
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] cannot be designated as a predator

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Never Endo Prey
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] cannot be designated as an endo vore target

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Never Fatal Prey
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] cannot be designated as a fatal vore target

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Inescapable
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label]’s insides are like a steel trap. Anything that goes in cannot be removed without either surgery or the full tour.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Indigestible
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] is immune to digestion. Not immune to bullets, blades, explosions, or even external acid sprays, but certainly immune to digestion.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Infinite capacity
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] doesn’t know the meaning of the word “full”. There’s always room for more prey. Always.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Instant digestion
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: Only the [PAWN_label]-tron reduces an entire preything into soup-like homogenate in 30 seconds.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Instant swallow
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] inhales prey like [PAWN_pronoun]'s drowning and the prey are air.
